title: Insure Landing Page
description: This is a project where I designed and developed a modern landing page. This project was to show case JavaScript skills, core CSS and CSS Animation skills.

title: TODO App
description: This is the project in which I created a Web TODO App which was developed in Vanilla JavaScript and used LocalStorage API to store the data.

title: Tic Tac Toe with AI
description: In this project I set out to develop Web App of classical game Tic Tac Toe but also implemented CPU Player to play with you using minimax algorithm.
